Muito legal esse jogo, Ã© bem leve e tem graficos relativamente bem bonitos, atÃ© me surpreendi um pouco, rodou bem no meu pc com linux e gpu onboard.

After years of hearing the famous phrase "The cake is a lie", I finally played this game. I got this on sale 90% off, but the $10 is still worth it. There are "19" main levels, challenge levels, and advanced levels, and with a unique storyline (a storyline that is heavily enforced by Portal 2, which I also recommend) and engaging gameplay, this is totally worth its cost. Just buy it, you won't be disappointed. Don't believe me or never heard of this game? Look at the thousands of other reviews.

One of the best games of all-time, one of the handful of games that I feel is genuinely perfect. An elegantly designed spatial-reasoning puzzle game that also introduced the world to GLaDOS, my favorite antagonist in all of gaming. Everyone interested in games owes it to themselves to try Portal; it's a short experience, it regularly goes on sale for like a dollar, and even at full price is worth every penny, so there are no excuses not to have played it.

Uno de los mejores juegos de Valve. Portal es un juego que mezcla acciÃ³n y lÃ³gica. Los distintos puzzles pondrÃ¡n a prueba tu cerebro hasta el lÃ­mite de poder completarlos.

Ouh lÃ  alors lÃ  beaucoups de choses positives Ã  dire:
POSITIF:
Le jeu est excellent et les niveaux sont bien travaillÃ©s avec une difficultÃ©e croissante et un univers robotisÃ© trÃ¨s "mignon" qui joue Ã©normÃ©ment sur l'humour de l'IA qui vous accompagnera lors des niveaux en temps que voix  et un scÃ©nario assez bon. Le jeu tourne plutÃ´t bien sur un PC assez "bas de gamme" mais avec une qualitÃ© assez bonne par exemple il tourne assez bien sur le mien qui possÃ¨de une GT 710, (ce qui n'est pas top) et ne demande pas de grandes ressources ! PS: No-Spoil mais dans le gÃ©nÃ©rique de fin il y a une musique assez cocasse et dans le mÃªme univers assez robotisÃ© de ce jeu magnifique :3.
NEGATIF:
Le seul aspect nÃ©gatif de ce jeu reste le rapport durÃ©e/prix qui est assez moyen (9,99â‚¬ en dehors des promotions pour 2-3 heures de jeu) donc je conseille Ã  ceux qui le voudraient de l'acheter lors d'une promo ;D ! Sur ce, bon jeu Ã  tous !
